head.title: About us | Interhome
head.description: About us - Interhome can satisfy just about any request with more than 35.000 online bookable holiday homes and apartments.

content.text:
Book approx. 40.000 quality tested holiday homes and apartments online

No matter what you’re looking for: Interhome can satisfy just about any request with approx. 40.000 online bookable holiday homes and apartments in 28 countries. Whether it’s a mountain chalet, a villa with pool, a city apartment, a cottage or a castle – you will find the right property for you! Interhome’s service includes the handling of the complete booking process, the payment, the key handover and the final cleaning. Additionally you can enjoy Interhome’s quality standards based on our standardized and widely recognized star rating.
Find your perfect place

Our Customer Experience Centre - ready to answer your questions 24/7

Interhome is available to advise you or answer your questions around the clock. Our Customer Experience Centre is just a phone call away 24 hours a day, 7 days a week and available in many languages. Call us anytime and we'll be happy to answer any questions you may have, or give tips about where and when to book your holiday home.
Questions? Contact us at any time

Personal advice & on-site service in holiday destinations

One of Interhome’s main strengths is that we’re always there when you need us. Interhome staff, partner agencies and key holders welcome and assist guests on-site and provide a comprehensive service. This local presence means that Interhome guests enjoy a straightforward handover of keys, assistance with the organization of activities and a personal contact in case of any needed support and advice.
Personalised service in holiday destinations

Swiss quality holiday homes and apartment rentals since 1965

Interhome was founded in 1965 in Switzerland and is proud to look back over many successful decades of experience in the holiday home rental business Today, Interhome is Europe’s leading provider of quality holiday homes and apartments worldwide. Interhome has 15 regional subsidiaries. The parent company Interhome Group (HHD AG), based in Glattbrugg, Zurich, is 100 % owned by MTCH AG (Hotelplan Group). This company is in turn 100% owned by Migros, Switzerland’s largest retail corporation with headquarters in Zurich. Our Swiss quality service mentality ensures you a great customer experience.
View company profile

content.headline: Safety in your holiday home!
content.key: Safe hand-over of the key on-site

elements.title: Hand-picked and tested accommodation
elements.subtitle: Quality is our number one priority
elements.caption: Every property is checked before your arrival to ensure the best possible stay.

elements.title: In-resort service and a 24/7 helpline
elements.subtitle: Make the most of our experience
elements.caption: Key collection is arranged by our helpful staff.  Available 24/7 or on-site service to help you with all your questions, e.g.: tips and insights for your holiday destination and your booked accommodation.

elements.title: A unique holiday experience
elements.subtitle: Privacy and freedom in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Be your own boss, eat whenever you want and make the most of plenty of space for all your friends and family.

elements.title: Why Choose Interhome?
elements.caption: It has never been easier to find your perfect holiday. Do you want to explore new travel destinations? There is no better way than from a holiday home: Enjoy "la dolce vita" in Italy, feel the charming lifestyle of the French Riviera or the Spanish way of life. Be inspired by our travel ideas and book online - quick, easy, and secure with Interhome.

elements.title: Freedom, privacy and space in your own holiday home
elements.caption: Your stay in a holiday house or a holiday apartment offers plenty of advantages: spend your time exactly as you want. No disturbance from other guests or hotel staff, just spend your holiday according to your own rules. Whether you are looking for a city trip, a relaxing holiday with your family or with friends. Simply enjoy lots of room, flexibility and freedom in your holiday home.
